./external/basejump_stl/bsg_misc/bsg_transpose.v Cov: 80% 

   1: module bsg_transpose #(width_p="inv"
   2: 		       ,els_p="inv"
   3: 		       ) (input    [els_p-1:0  ][width_p-1:0] i
   4: 			  , output [width_p-1:0][els_p-1:0]   o
   5: 			  );
   6:    genvar x, y;
   7: 
   8:    for (x = 0; x < els_p; x++)
   9:      begin: rof
  10: 	for (y = 0; y < width_p; y++)
  11: 	  begin: rof2
  12: 	     assign o[y][x] = i[x][y];
  13: 	  end
  14:      end
  15:     
  16: endmodule
  17:
